About the Company: Bhagwati Banquets & Hotels Ltd is engaged in the business of banquet halls, marriage halls, party halls and plots, hotels, restaurants, catering and cafe, taveran, refreshment room, entertainments, amusements, club, bath, grounds and places of recreation, sports, picnic places and hotel related services.The company presently operates and manages one Hotel under the name The Grand Bhagwati and a chain of Restaurants at various locations in Ahmedabad.
